jacs_use_filesystem.description: write documents to the filesystem - false or 0 or 1 as string

jacs_use_security.description: use strict security features - false or 0 or 1 as string

jacs_data_directory.description: path to store documents and agents

jacs_agent_private_key_filename.description: name of private key to use. Will include .enc if password is supplied.

jacs_agent_key_algorithm.description: algorithm to use for creating and using keys

jacs_agent_schema_version.description: version number of the schema used to validate agent

jacs_header_schema_version.description: version number of the schema used to validate headers

jacs_signature_schema_version.description: version number of the schema used to validate signature

jacs_private_key_password.description: encryption password. Do not use in production and instead only keep in ENV with JACS_AGENT_PRIVATE_KEY_PASSWORD
